name: Status-4-Evar Improved - Fx 4+
description:
For Firefox 4+ and latest Firefox Beta, Aurora, and Nightly builds.

This style hides extension Status-4-Evar:
https://addons.mozilla.org/firefox/addon/status-4-evar/versions/
"Download Status" button text when No Active Downloads are in Progress and Urlbar Icons remain visible on Hovered Links.

Tested on Firefox 4+ and up to the latest Firefox Beta, Aurora, Nightly builds.

Modified code from:

style 36954

user 65451

To customize or fix Firefox Beta, Aurora, and Nightly builds, you can also have a look at my other styles: user 61655
